com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
Class MetaioCloudViewActivity

java.lang.Object
  MapActivity
      com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.MetaioCloudViewActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.MetaioCloudDataManager.Callback, SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetaioCloudARViewActivity
public abstract class MetaioCloudViewActivity
extends MapActivity
implements com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.MetaioCloudDataManager.Callback, SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback

Base class for junaio views (AR, Map or List).

It provides functionalities to search POIs, send POIs' events, refresh channel (based on timer, location change or filters).

Author:
arsalan.malik
